name: Vikram Singh
body:
Welcome to Vikram's github profile

Feel free to checkout my projects!

### Profile:
I'm currently working as a Technical Operations Engineer at Imagine Software. My role primarily involves monitoring our risk management system, solving any issues related to the output generated by our automated systems. I also work closely with the release team in testing and deploying new releases.

In terms of programming languages, I am good at Python, can work with Perl and Shell scripts. I am adept at Linux commands. Good at SQL queries. I have used all the above mentioned in my professional role.

### Goals:
I have a few goals. One is to work as a Product Manager and make cool products. Start a company that helps society. Work in a farm.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
